alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Dubois; Orange (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 11:58PM EDT until May 20 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Dubois County in south central Indiana... Northwestern Crawford County in south central Indiana... Orange County in south central Indiana... * Until 1230 AM EDT. * At 1157 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Shoals to 10 miles east of Jasper to near Dale, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paoli, English, Ferdinand, Orleans, French Lick, Stampers Creek, Orangeville, West Baden Springs, Birdseye, and Hillham. This line of storms produced 52 mph winds in Dubois County four miles east of Jasper. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
